detailsOfAchievement: Punarjagaran Samiti was established on 24/10/1994 under Registrar chits and funds, Allahabad, UP vide Registration no. 575/94-95. This organization worked on various social issues like Family planning, projects on upliftment of Scheduled caste and minorities, Upliftment of differently abled people, Projects related to health and sanitation, Blood donation, etc. Its major achievements and activities includes the Cultural activities including Sanskritik Mohatsav, 1996- a Severn day cultural event. The organization has acclaimed huge respect in the society for its pioneer step in girls education in the district. The organization remain in force till 24/10/2014 till it got annexed along with all its responsibilities and property by the new trust named Punar Jagaran samiti Trust (registered on 9/10/2014). Presently The organization is managing the below mentioned educational institutes in Pratapgarh district: 1 Saket Shiksha Niketan Recognized by Basic education board, UP) Est: 1996 2 Saket Girls Junior High School Recognized by Basic education board, UP) Est: 1997 3 Saket Girls Inter College: Hindi Medium Recognized by UP Intermediate Education board, Allahabad) Est: 1997 4 Saket Girls Inter College: Hindi Medium Recognized by UP Intermediate Education board, Allahabad) Est: 2016 5 Saket Industrial training center Recognized by NCVT, New Delhi) Est: 1998 6 Saket Girls P.G. College Recognized by RMLAU, Faizabad) Est: 2005 7 Saket Girls Teachers Training Institute Recognized by NCTE, Jaipur) Est: 2010 Saket Girls P.G. College and Institute of Teachers Training is accredited by NAAC with B grade. Through various thematic cultural events Saket family has been working on various social and cultural issues since 1996. The list of various themes includes Beti Bachao, beti padhao, Women Empowerment, The development of Hindi language, Incarnation of Vishnu Dashavtar, Dances of earth, Origin of Ganges. Saket got widely appraised by whole society and all major news agencies of the district for the noble initiatives it has been taking from time to time. Saket actively participated in Election awareness programs and secured first position for the same. The institute has emerged as first educational institute to come up with water conversation and preservation schemes. The vehicles owned by the institute are highly secured and monitored through the latest technology and vehicle Tracking systems. The campus is fully Wifi Enabled and CCTV camera secured. The institute is equipped with modern laboratories, e library, well equipped gymnasium and sports facilities and other modern necessities. Numerous seminars and workshops have been conducted by the institute on varied issues like target of education, Teachers Education, New Education policy etc. The organization has worked with its extended team named We Want Change in Delhi on various social and cultural issues including, women education, child education, slum area development. Some of its projects got widely acclaimed by all major news agencies and government agencies. WWCs project on Election awareness in 2014 got awarded by various government agencies including the Election Commission.

detailsOfAchievement: I. To propagate and encourage education especially in rural areas and to help the youth to become enlightened citizens of India. II. To undertake, promote, organize, collaborate, co-ordinate or aid research in the field of basic and higher education to improve its content and quality by opening of institutes, colleges and schools etc in different fields. III. To establish and maintain libraries and information services in its different institutions. IV. To promote the study of the language, literature and culture. V. To provide facilities for handicrafts, indoor and outdoor games, physical exercises, training and education in classical literature, Music, Arts, Yoga and Pranayams etc. VI. To organize lectures on subjects of special value to children and youth of national and international interest. VII. To publish journals and other useful literature in furtherance of its avowed objective of propagating and encouraging education among the children and the youth. VIII. To co-operate with organizations having similar aims and objects.
